io.elegie.luchess.web.client.models

Class BuildMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.web.client.models.BuildMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexMonitor

    public class BuildMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IndexMonitor
    This object holds information related to the last / current build. It acts as an execution report, and as such can be stored, displayed, e-mailed, or whatever a controller sees fitting.

      • started

        public void started()
        Description copied from interface: IndexMonitor
        Lifecycle method. Should always be called before the session begins.
        Specified by:
        started in interface IndexMonitor

      • finished

        public void finished()
        Description copied from interface: IndexMonitor
        Lifecycle method. Should always be called after the session ends, even if the session fails (in which case the IndexMonitor.failed(BuildException) should be called in between).
        Specified by:
        finished in interface IndexMonitor

      • failed

      • getNumGames

        public long getNumGames()
        Returns:
        The number of games indexed so far.

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration()
        Returns:
        The duration the indexing took (has currently taken if running), zero if not started.

      • acknowledgeFailure

        public boolean acknowledgeFailure()
        Returns:
        True if there was an unacknowledged failure.
